name: iGrammatik
short_description: Aim is to give in any text and then let the software classify that into grammar units. This is the main aim. Because it is so boring to read the examples in other grammar practice softwares, which provide their own examples and honestly it is boring. The uses of this software should be able to input their own text and let the software decide which sentence belongs to which grammar. Isnt it sweet to learn german or in the future any language just by reading your favorite Novel???
summary: A way to learn german grammar using software
